directions: Combine mayonnaise, hard-cooked eggs, lemon juice, ketchup, green onion, tarragon vinegar, parsley, capers, garlic, horseradish, mustard, and savory in a bowl; mix until well-blended. Cover with plastic wrap and chill for flavors to combine, at least 1 hour or overnight.
title: Granny's Remoulade Sauce
